entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
